caseTitle: Justice Qazi Faez Isa v. The President of Pakistan & others
authorJudge: (1) Mr. Justice Maqbool Baqar (2) Mr. Justice Mazhar Alam Khan Miankhel (3) Mr. Justice Syed Mansoor Ali Shah (4) Mr. Justice Amin-Ud-Din Khan
tagline: No one, including a Judge of the highest court in the land, is above the law. At the same time, no one, including a Judge of the highest court in the land, can be denied his right to be dealt with in accordance with law.
